Others: USA Cricket announces a member exclusive ticketing offer for the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2024 home matches.
The offer includes a 25% discount on tickets for three home matches: USA vs. Canada, USA vs. Pakistan, and USA vs. Ireland.
The matches will take place in Dallas, TX and Lauderhill, FL.
The initiative aims to encourage supporters to rally behind Team USA as they embark on their inaugural campaign at the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup.
